ModMetaData.name: Easy Extra Apparel Layers
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.5
Easy Extra Apparel Layers This mod makes worn apparel render in acending order of the apparels last ApparelLayerDef's drawOrder. Higher order layers will be drawn above/ontop of lower ordered layers.
Now supports rendering over Shell Now supports rendering over Overhead
No content is included in this mod, other than several Apparel layer defs, and a commented out example apparel thingdef.
Note that while i havent seen it in testing, it is possible, due to the way rims pawn rendering works that you may experience flickering or clipping when a pawn is wearing Alot of apparel because the way this mod works is reducing the space between the layers being drawn
Currently Incompatible with: Combat Extended (transpilers conflicting, causing no apparel to be rendered)
